titles.title: The Voice Of My Beloved, Lo, He Comes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes.
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes.
He's leaping over the mountains
And skipping over the hills
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The voice of my Beloved says to me.
The voice of my Beloved says to me,
Rise up, my love, fair one and comes away with me.
The voice of my Beloved says to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For lo, the winter is over and is past.
For lo, the winter is over and is past.
The flowers appear and the birds sing.
And the voice of the turtle is heard,
For lo, the winter is over and past.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Who is this coming up from the wilderness?
Who is this coming up from the wilderness?
She's leaning on her Beloved for love is strong as death.
Who is this coming up from the wilderness?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Many waters cannot quench love neither can the floods drown love.
If a man give all that he has for love it would utterly be contemned.
For many waters cannot quench love.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The voice of my Beloved says to me.
The voice of my Beloved says to me,
Thou art all fair, my loved one, there is no spot in thee.
The voice of my Beloved says to me.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
La voz de mi amado ya está
La voz de mi amado ya está
saltando sobre los montes
brincando en los collados
la voz de mi amado ya está.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
/La voz de mi amado me dice a mí/ (2)
levántate mi paloma y huye ya conmigo
la voz de mi amado me dice a mi.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
/Mis pecados son borrados ya/ (2)
mi Jesús los sepultó en la más profunda mar
mis pecados son borrados ya.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
/En un día nacerá una nación. / (2)
cuando esté de parto Sión dará a luz
en un día nacerá una nación.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
/Si Jesús viene al mundo otra vez/ (2)
Satanás será hollado por los hijos del Señor
Si Jesús viene al mundo otra vez.
